item.title: A POWERFUL AUTHORING TOOL
item.description: A POWERFUL AUTHORING TOOL Content Bring your content to life with our simple and flexible editing tool. Interactions Author using a suit of interaction types that help you engage your learners. Media Seamlessly embed an array of media including YouTube videos.
